definition: no harm (in doing it)/One might as well./It won't hurt./no matter/it's no bother
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
to hinder/(in the negative or interrogative) (no) harm/(what) harm
there is no harm in saying what one thinks (idiom)

sentences.english: Like the MM let beans are usually now your food list.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢美的MM无妨让豆类常呈现在你的食物清单上。

sentences.english: Feel free to bring your brother if he would like to come.
sentences.chinese: 假如爱好的话，您无妨带令兄一路去。

sentences.english: You may as well know the truth.
sentences.chinese: 你知道真实情形也无妨。

sentences.english: But it is as well to think about the impossible.
sentences.chinese: 但是试想下不可能之事也无妨。

sentences.english: It's OK if you can't get a full-body shot.
sentences.chinese: 若无法拍全身照也无妨。

sentences.english: Feel free to try it, especially if a pickle craving is actually keeping you awake at night.
sentences.chinese: 尝试一下无妨，特别是如果你不吃点泡菜睡不着的话。

sentences.english: Write as much or as little as you can each day, and date the entries.
sentences.chinese: 每天写多或写少也无妨，但记要注明是何时写的。

sentences.english: But there is no harm in adding it as a reminder of the importance of Bodhi intentions.
sentences.chinese: 但是就提醒发菩提心的重要性而言，增入此是无妨的。

sentences.english: Now a study shows cousins run few risks in mating.
sentences.chinese: 现在一项研究表明近亲联姻并无妨。

definition: unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind
not to mind/unconcerned
I (spoken by an old man)
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be
at worst/if worst comes to worst/serious/alarming
to hinder/(in the negative or interrogative) (no) harm/(what) harm
solely engrossed in one thing/just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest)/simply/by all means/please feel free/do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
in my opinion
important
you all (archaic)/see also 你們|你们[ni3 men5]
(final particle, same as 吧)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to act as if/to treat sth as if it were
you're welcome/don't mention it/no need to stand on ceremony
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
not as good as/not equal to/inferior
